name: Wayne Barack Jansen
public_role: Governor of New Jersey, former MMA champion, surprise presidential hopeful with a popular YouTube channel 'Fist of the People'
invitation_reason: His folksy charm and unmatched charisma make him a natural propaganda vector—or a dangerous loose cannon.
secret_or_twist: Did he sell workout supplements to kids? Did he 'accidentally' arm a militia?

name: Vaultsy
public_role: Allegedly a myth, but viral videos are real. Latest stunt: vanishing the Statue of Liberty’s torch.
invitation_reason: Art destabilizes narrative—and Vaultsy’s black-market mystique undermines the aesthetics of consumer control.
secret_or_twist: Secretly a group? An AI? Next heist: Wikipedia.

name: Steph Efforts
public_role: Creator of EffortNet, decentralized dream-storage. Speaks at TEDx via drone.
invitation_reason: Dreams outside CC infrastructure threaten their control.
secret_or_twist: Rumored replaced by a deepfake in 2023… no one noticed.

name: Camilla Bumblage
archetype: Celebrity magic professor, influencer enchantment master
public_role: Teaches at NYU Spelltisch, hosts 'Magic, Money & Manifesting'.
invitation_reason: Her vast audience is spellbound—but she hasn’t fully sold out yet.
secret_or_twist: Once hexed a sponsor live on air. Ratings never recovered.

name: Jordan Lumberpond
archetype: Indie folk icon turned Grammy-winning pop star
public_role: Known for soulful ballads, protest anthems, silence during 2024 Brand Wars.
invitation_reason: Lyrics influence millions—CC wants to license that influence.

name: Winifred Goopington
archetype: Wellness mogul, spiritual grifter, mystic celeb
public_role: Founder of Goop&Glow, selling enlightenment crystals to sentient probiotics.
invitation_reason: Already sells narratives—CC wants to franchise her belief system.
secret_or_twist: Might have achieved enlightenment… but mostly placebo.

name: Moose Griddles
public_role: Known for 'I Drank My Own Pee in Times Square' and 'Bear Wrestling 101'.
secret_or_twist: Claims to have fought a Wi-Fi wendigo. CC believes him.

name: Ingrid Tienfjørg
archetype: Global activist, Nobel laureate, enemy of corporate greenwashing
public_role: Founder of WorldHarmony, cross-planar social justice coalition.
invitation_reason: Her moral clarity could ruin or legitimize CC’s plans.
secret_or_twist: Believes in redemption… even for CC.

name: Dr. Hargrave Quennington Beauregard IV
public_role: Professor at Columbia, hosts 'Mystery, Mayhem & Mint Juleps' on PBS.
secret_or_twist: May have no magic at all—just wit and charm.
